title: Bug 41039Hitting the Enter/Return key in the Find/Replace dialog doesn't do anything on Mac OS X
description: Eclipse 3.0 M2Build id: 200307181617Mac OS X 10.2.61) Open the Find/Replace dialog (Edit  Find/Replace).2) Type in a search term into the text box.3) Hit the return key.Nothing happens.Hitting the Return key should do a "Find" operation (thesame as clicking on the "Find" button, which is highlighted as the "default"button in the Find/Replace dialog).
